name: tirreno
description: Tirreno is a self-hosted operational analytics and reporting tool for maritime or logistics data. It aggregates metrics and events into dashboards to support monitoring and decision making.
features: Data aggregation: Collect and consolidate operational data from multiple sources into unified dashboards.
Metrics tracking: Monitor key performance indicators and business metrics with real-time updates.
Event logging: Record and analyze operational events for troubleshooting and process improvement.
Dashboard creation: Build custom dashboards with charts, tables, and visualizations for different stakeholders.
Reporting: Generate reports on operational performance, trends, and anomalies for decision support.
Data visualization: Present complex data through intuitive charts, graphs, and visual representations.
Alert system: Set up alerts for threshold breaches or anomalies to respond quickly to issues.
Historical analysis: Access historical data to identify patterns and trends over time.
Multi-source: Integrate data from various systems and sources for comprehensive operational visibility.
Custom queries: Query data using flexible filters and parameters to answer specific business questions.
Export capabilities: Export data and reports in various formats for sharing or further analysis.
Role-based access: Control who can view or modify dashboards and data with granular permissions.
